author: remm
msg: - Reset the app context when stopping.
- This fixes a problem where the context parameters are not being reread.

author: remm
msg: - Patch submitted by David Haraburda <david-tomcat at haraburda.com>

author: remm
msg: - Disallow setLocale from an included servlet.
- Patch submitted by Arvind Srinivasan <arvind.srinivasan at sun.com>

author: remm
msg: - I'm not too sure why, but the memory leak was caused by the introduction
of per-instance dates in HttpRequestBase. It is unclear to me where references
were kept, though. OptimizeIt didn't reveal anything interesting.
- The request dispatcher now uses a more optimized object for the mapping.
- Somehow, this seems to be causing a VM crash of JDK 1.3.1 on my Windows machine,
on startup. If anyone gets the crash and has an idea why it does crash that
would be nice. JDK 1.4 works fine.

author: hgomez
msg: PR: Allow you to build TC 4.0 without coyote jar present in system,
since coyote need TC 4.0 to be build, we fix a chicken&eggs problem
